root.name: Dead in the Water
root.description: Dead in the Water is a racing shooter that is all about blowing up the other racers' boats and your objective is to win the race and in some cases get the most kills. There aren't many modes in the game, just a little career mode that isn't that deep which has you go through a list of courses and you check them off the list after you are done. The other is single race where you and/or a friend go head to head or against AI opponents and just go through a normal race. It is similar to the Twisted Metal series as it's also a vehicular based shooter racer.
